title: I now know why I don't do team builder
body:
It's where the Bronze 5s gather. I chose {{champion:75}} , and was happily farming top. I was beating {{champion:23}}  handily, and getting quite a few stacks. It was looking pretty good. As I was taking out the inner tower, 

{{champion:17}} gg we lose
{{champion:64}} this team
{{champion:75}} it's okay guys. we might win

I check the scoreboard and, ***WOAH***. Lowest deaths other than me was *1/8 Jinx*! 1/11 Thresh, 2/11 Lee, 1/12 Teemo.
How did this happen when I wasn't looking?
